attributes.action: STOP THE £25 CONGESTION CHARGE IN LONDON
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The current £8 per day congestion charge was aimed at reducing traffic and pollution in London. 
Traffic is just the same as it always was, this has made no difference whatsoever.
The proposed £25 charge will also not reduce traffic as people will want and or need there cars in London. This is just another tax on people who have sporty and or upmarket cars.
£25 per day 
£125 per week 
£6500 per year
Add 40% tax, £9100 cost to the motorist per annum. 
Please support my petition even if you are not a motorist, this (Ken Livingston) needs to be stopped.

rejection.details: Please limit use of capital letters in title. Petition also duplicate of existing one: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/25poundConCharge/ so cannot be approved.
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
